title: Swap final romantic image on /forever page to new static asset

requirements.summary: Replace the final romantic image on the /forever page with the new provided romantic image served as a frontend static asset, preserving the existing container styling and overlay gradient.
acceptanceCriteria: The /forever page displays the new final romantic image in the final image section (replacing the previous one).
The new image is served from a file under frontend/public/assets/generated and loads without 404s in production builds.
The final image container styling remains consistent (rounded-3xl frame, border, shadow, and top overlay gradient remain visually intact).

file_operations.description: Add the new generated static image asset exactly as required: frontend/public/assets/generated/final-romantic-scene-v2.dim_1920x1080.png (Romantic couple silhouette at sunset with soft bokeh hearts, cinematic lighting, warm blush/champagne palette).

Update the final romantic image to use the new static asset path /assets/generated/final-romantic-scene-v2.dim_1920x1080.png, keeping the existing container classes and overlay gradient unchanged (rounded-3xl, border, shadow-2xl, and bg-gradient-to-t overlay).
